'''Childe and Teucer's Mora Pouch''' is a quest item from [[Tartaglia]]'s first [[Story Quest]], [[Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!]], during "[[Teucer's Terrific Tour]]." It starts out with 35,000 [[Mora]].

As with the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Downtown]]," where you could barter with the workers, you can barter with [[Granny Shan]] and [[Chef Mao]] to lower the amount of Mora spent to entertain [[Teucer]].

After completing the quest, any leftover Mora can be exchanged at the [[Northland Bank]] by talking to [[Ekaterina]].
